dcterms:description: The dataset contains nine semantic relation types and one artificial relation type 'Other', which means that the relation does not belong to any of the nine relation types. The nine relation types are Cause-Effect, Component-Whole, Content-Container, Entity-Destination, Entity-Origin, Instrument-Agency, Member-Collection, Message-Topic, and Product-Producer. The dataset contains 10,717 sentences, with each containing two nominals e1 and e2, and the corresponding relation type in the sentence. The relation is directional, meaning that Component-Whole(e1, e2) is different from Component-Whole(e2, e1). The dataset has already been partitioned into 8,000 training instances and 2,717 test instances.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2010 Task 8
